Change Log
==========

0.1.3 (2018-07-17)
------------------

- Fix for botocore >= 1.10.58.

0.1.2 (2018-06-22)
------------------

- Broke out LocalstackSession into RunningSession which doesn't start localstack itself.

0.1.1 (2018-04-23)
------------------

- Fixed bug where patched botocore clients wouldn't populated the `_exceptions` attribute.

0.1.0 (2018-03-13)
------------------

- Initial release
